heroSubtitle: Come dance with us! Contra dancing is a traditional American folk dance done to live music. It's easy to learn, and fun for all ages and experience levels. No partner or experience required!

features.title: Coffee & Jam
features.content: Come join the fun on the 2nd Sundays of each month, from 1:30pm to 4:30pm at Triangle Club. There will be coffee and snacks to purchase ($5 donation suggested).

features.title: Camp Damp 2025
features.content: Our annual dance camp has been cancelled for 2025. We hope to see you at future events!

features.title: Dance Schedule
features.content: Check out our upcoming contra dances and special events. Most dances are from 7:30-10:30 PM.
